articles.author: Jessica Lyons Hardcastle
articles.title: Third MOVEit bug fixed a day after PoC exploit made public - The Register
articles.description: Millions of people's personal info swiped, Clop leaks begin with 'Shell's stolen data'
articles.content:
Progress Software on Friday issued a fix for a third critical bug in its MOVEit file transfer suite, a vulnerability that had just been disclosed the day earlier.
Details of the latest vulnerability… [+4282 chars]
